channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
Hey guys i'm in need of some really big help... Well whenever I have my server up and try to put it on moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php it says its offline? Heres some pic's see if these can help. Btw This is my first server and im using port 5555 so i port-forwarded that port AND added it to exceptions with the firewall. [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/35cllxk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/245n9xt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/etdv1h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/xbjsld.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/14lujnt.jpg[/img]
HELP ME PLEASE

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Your IP adress isnt 192.168.1.1

Open up Control Panel

then open Network and Internet Connections

then click Network Connections

Click on the connection you are using

Click the support tab

Then it will say Ip Adress:

it should be like 192.168.1.###

Whatever the ### is, put that in the portforward box instead of the 1…

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @unknown0154 unknown0154
item.description:
@unknown0154 wrote:

[2008-12-07 15:51:00] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted.
^That’s what utorrent says^ is this correct or what can someone give me utorrent tut?

Read full topic

well utorrent is for portforwarding so now u can use 43594

Sorry that im noobie lulz.
